entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Flurries at times heavy ending early this evening then 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Increasing cloudiness. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light late in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
